name: An Octave Higher - Basic Soundtrack
detailed_description: From the magical world of An Octave Higher comes the Basic Soundtrack collection. Dive once again into the world of Overture, a city on the edge of a magical revolution, as this classical collection takes you back to the struggles, the victories and the adventure of Elise, Franz and Frederic.
about_the_game: From the magical world of An Octave Higher comes the Basic Soundtrack collection. Dive once again into the world of Overture, a city on the edge of a magical revolution, as this classical collection takes you back to the struggles, the victories and the adventure of Elise, Franz and Frederic.
short_description: Relive the magical struggle between classes as this collection of classical music featured in An Octave Higher. Here by popular demand, An Octave Higher - Basic Soundtrack features 26 tracks from the game.
legal_notice: Licensed by Kidalang. Licensed to and published by Active Gaming Media Inc.
